pgTitle: List of museums in the Inland Empire (California)

rows.text: Beauty Bubble Hair and Beauty Museum and Salon

website, The only medical museum in Southern California. Displays include a 1900-1930s doctor's office, library, art, photography and over 20 display cabinets of medical items.
